active_incidents.title: Trouble with signing in, loading messages, and accessing channels

notes.body:
Issue summary:
On February 16, 2021 from 11:40 a.m. to 12:36 p.m. PST, a small number of customers may have had trouble signing in, loading messages, and accessing channels within Slack. 

Our team determined that a background data maintenance task did not throttle itself properly, resulting in replication lag that affected Slack's performance for impacted customers.

We rolled out a fix which resolved the issue and by 12:36 p.m. PST, Slack was working as normal again for all affected users.
